channel.title: Error when running client
channel.description:
I get this error when running the 194 Deob by Peter.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at client.<init>(client.java:276) at client.main(client.java:7921) Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException at java.awt.Container.addImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Container.add(Unknown Source) at javax.swing.JFrame.addImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Container.add(Unknown Source) at NPCList.<init>(NPCList.java:33) at Class8.<clinit>(Class8.java:389) ... 2 more

item.title: Error when running client
